Talk_0110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is a sanctuary for <clr:0000>Dondons<clr:ffff>,
the new animal species discovered
by <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
<clr:0000>Dondons <clr:ffff>are quite precious, as we've only
found five of their kind in the wild. Please
be gentle if you touch them.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>They might look intimidating, but you've
got nothing to worry about. They're a
good-natured sort.
When the princess came to research
the Dondons, they used to go tromping
around after her wherever she went.
I think they're actually quite fond of us
two-legged folk.
Talk_0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh my. You've taken an interest in the
Dondons, hm? I don't blame you.

Only five of these little ones have been
found in the world. Few have the chance
to meet them in person.
I promise, strange as they look, they're a
good-natured sort. They used to follow
the princess around like little ducklings.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>Oh, and the way she would dote on them!
It was very sweet.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Anyway, they really are gentle. Feel free
to come visit them whenever you find
yourself out here.
Talk_0124: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Ah, sunshine! <sp:5:0:0>I just hope it sticks around.
Talk_0112:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>That reminds me... <sp:5:1:0>Did you hear that
rumor about Princess Zelda being seen
riding a beast?
Well, I'd bet what people actually saw
was her with a Dondon back when she
established this sanctuary!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It just goes to show how much rumors
can take on a life of their own.<sp:5:0:0> Dondons
aren't beastly. They're adorable.
Talk_0125:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>All this thunder and lightning...<sp:5:1:0> It's really
fraying my nerves.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Maybe we should take shelter. Go and
watch the Dondons while we wait out
this storm.
Talk_0126:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>You startled me. I wasn't expecting
to run into anyone in this storm.
Talk_0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh my! You must have come quite
a long way!
Talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Still, you must have come quite a
long way!
Near_0004: I hate this, I hate this...
Talk_0130: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Excuse me, but...<sp:5:1:0>you can't take that gem.
Talk_0131:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That gem is a precious clue to
understanding <clr:0000>Dondons<clr:ffff>' lives
and habits.
Talk_0132:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry to repeat myself,<sp:5:0:0> but that gem is a
clue to learning about the lives and habits
of <clr:0000>Dondons<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0120:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>W-<sp:5:0:0>wait!<sp:5:0:0> We'll get wet out here!


If you want to talk, let's talk over there.
Talk_0133:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>You'll have to bear with me. It's a bit of
a long story.

One day, some <clr:0000>luminous stones <clr:ffff>I'd
picked up fell out of my bag.

Before I knew it, a <clr:0000>Dondon <clr:ffff>charged over,
and then...

<sp:3:0:2:0b01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Chomp, chomp!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


It gobbled the luminous stones<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>right up!


<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>These animals show no interest in food...
and then luminous stones, of all things,
spark their hunger? <sp:5:0:0>I was shocked!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>After a while, we found <clr:0000>gems<clr:ffff> on the
ground where the Dondon grazed.

Those...<sp:5:0:0>are the gems.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Where they came from remains a little
uncertain,<sp:5:0:0> but I think the Dondon created
them after eating the <clr:0000>luminous stones<clr:ffff>.
If that's the case, I might learn more
about the nature of Dondons by studying
those. So please, don't take them.
Talk_0121:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh dear, oh dear... Rain comes down
so suddenly here. I hate it.

The Dondons don't seem to mind though.
Talk_0134:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I'm sorry.<sp:5:0:0> I can't give you those gems.


But I'm happy to tell you about Dondons,
if you're interested!
Talk_0122:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Eeeyah!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> I've hated lightning ever since
I was a child.

But the Dondons, they don't even
flinch at the sound of thunder.
They're unflappable.
Talk_0135:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Thank you... <sp:5:0:0>And please, be sure to spend
time with the Dondons while you're here.
